response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product embodies innovation, quality, and functionality, making it an unparalleled investment for those seeking top-tier solutions. Given its exceptional value and unique features, we believe its worth far exceeds $10,000. For this incredible opportunity, I am extending an exclusive offer of $15,000. Should you decide to accept, you'll be acquiring not just a product, but a testament to excellence that will serve you well for years to come. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information.", "product_price": 15000}
